var initialState=[];// load cart items from local storage
if(typeof window!=="undefined"){if(localStorage.getItem("cart")){initialState=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cart"));}else{initialState=[];}}export var cartReducer=function cartReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"ADD_TO_CART":return action.payload;default:return state;}};
